title: Where can I find historical photographs/information concerning hospitals, medical facilities, patient treatments, etc. related to Brunswick, Pender, Duplin and Columbus counties prior to 1960.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/where-can-i-find-historical-photographsinformation-concerning-local-medical-facilities-and-patient-treatments-prior-to-1960/
